src:
Waketum Gerindra : Pengusaha Belum Optimis dengan Susunan Kabinet Indonesia Maju
06 Nov 2019, 18:25 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Waketum Gerindra : Pengusaha Belum Optimis dengan Susunan Kabinet Indonesia Maju

KBRN, Jakarta : Wakil Ketua Umum (Waketum) Partai Gerindra, Arief Poyuono menilai, susunan Kabinet Indonesia Maju pemerintahan Presiden dan Wakil Presiden RI Joko Widodo - Maruf Amin tidak bisa memberikan rasa optimistis bagi para pengusaha. Khususnya pada susunan kabinet di bidang ekonomi.Buktinya, sejauh ini menurut dia jangankan pengusaha international, pengusaha dalam negeri saja belum optimis untuk melakukan investasi di Indonesia."Waduh ternyata kabinet Indonesia maju tidak bisa memberikan rasa optimistik pada pengusaha nasional, untuk melakukan investasi dan ekspansi. Apalagi investor asing, sudah dipastikan juga enggan untuk melakukan ekspansi usaha di Indonesia," katanya kepada wartawan di Jakarta, Rabu (6/11/2019).Tidak optimisnya para pengusaha lokal maupun internasional untuk berinvestasi menurut dia juga karena lesunya ekonomi bangsa ini. Yang mana sesuai data yang dirilis oleh Badan Pusat Statistik (BPS), pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia di kuartal III-2019 hanya sebesar 5,02 persen year on year (yoy).Â "Angka ini jauh lebih rendah dari kuartal III-2018 sebesar 5,17 persen," sesalnya.Maka dari itu, Arief uang juga Ketua Umum Federasi Serikat Pekerja (FSP) BUMN Bersatu ini pun memprediksi bahwa pada akhir tahun 2019 nanti, pertumbuhan ekonomi Indonesia hanya di bawah 5 persen."Ekonomi Indonesia bertumbuh di akhir 2019 hanya akan berada dibawah 5 persenan. Lesunya ekonomi," pungkas Arief. (Foto : Tangkap Layar/ TV One)
text:
Waketum Gerindra: Entrepreneurs Are Not Optimistic about the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet Structure
Nov 6 2019, 18:25 by Bunaiya Fauzi Arubone


Waketum Gerindra: Entrepreneurs Are Not Optimistic about the Advanced Indonesian Cabinet Structure

KBRN, Jakarta: Deputy Chairperson (Waketum) of the Gerindra Party, Arief Poyuono rate, the composition of the Indonesian Cabinet The government of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia Joko Widodo - Maruf Amin cannot provide optimism for entrepreneurs. Especially in the composition of the cabinet in the economic field. The proof, so far according to him, let alone international entrepreneurs, domestic entrepreneurs alone are not optimistic about investing in Indonesia. "Wow, it turns out that the advanced Indonesian cabinet cannot provide a sense of optimism for national entrepreneurs, to invest and expand "Especially foreign investors have certainly been reluctant to expand their businesses in Indonesia," he told reporters in Jakarta on Wednesday (11/06/2019). He was not optimistic about local and international entrepreneurs to invest according to him because of the sluggish economy of the nation. Which according to data released by the Central Statistics Agency (BPS), Indonesia's economic growth in the third quarter of 2019 was only 5.02 percent year on year (yoy). "This figure is much lower than the third quarter of 2018 of 5.17 percent," he regretted. Then from that, Arief also the Chairperson of the United States Federation of Trade Unions (FSP) also predicted that at the end of 2019, Indonesia's economic growth only under 5 percent. "Indonesia's economy will grow at the end of 2019, it will only be under 5 percent. The sluggish economy," concluded Arief. (Photo: Screenshot / TV One)
